name: Glean
short_desc: Self-hosted RSS reader and personal knowledge management
author: LeslieLeung
description: Glean (拾灵) is a self-hosted RSS reader and personal knowledge management tool. It helps information-heavy consumers efficiently manage their reading through intelligent RSS aggregation. Features include RSS/Atom subscription with OPML import/export, clean reading experience, read later functionality, folders and tags for organization, bookmarks, background feed sync, and a modern responsive UI.
